sen.j: 『万葉集』から現在（寛弘期）までの和歌のうち、四季39首（うち、春22・夏2・秋7・冬8）・恋7首・雑32首の3部構成で計78首が採録されている（ただし、69首本・76首本もある）。
sen.e: Among many waka from "Manyoshu" (Collection of Ten Thousand Leaves) to the present (Kanko era), total 78 poets are recorded in three parts: 39 poets in four seasons (spring: 22, summer: 2, autumn: 7, and winter: 8), 7 poets in love, and 32 poets in misc (there are books that contain 69 poets or 76 poets).
